ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( TechStatusApprovalProcess__c = FALSE, OR( ISPICKVAL(SBQQ__Status__c, "En Attente Remise"), ISPICKVAL(SBQQ__Status__c, "Remise Accordée")))
